1.label: Start-up status
1.description: Defines the status of the device, in term of light level, following a restart.

2.label: Fade On Time
2.description: Defines the time spent to switch the load from complete OFF to complete ON

3.label: Fade Off Time
3.description: Defines the time spent to switch the load from complete ON to complete OFF

4.label: Local Dimming Time
4.description: Defines the time spent to switch the controlled load

10.label: Minimum Light Level
10.description: Defines which light level will correspond to 1% in the range between 1 and 98%

11.label: Maximum Light Level
11.description: Defines which light level will correspond to 99% in the range between 2 and 99%

20.label: Dimmable Load
20.description: Define if the connected loads are dimmable or not

62.label: Type of external switch
62.description: Defines the type of external switch connected to the device
